name: Miller Industries, Inc.
description: Miller Industries, Inc. is the world's largest manufacturer of towing and recovery equipment, providing innovative solutions to the towing and recovery industry since its founding in 1990. Headquartered in Ooltewah, Tennessee, the company designs and produces a comprehensive range of products, including tow trucks, trailers, and recovery vehicles. Miller Industries is recognized for its commitment to quality, safety, and technological advancement, offering a variety of products tailored to meet the diverse needs of its customers. The company's flagship brands, such as Century, Vulcan, and Holmes, are synonymous with reliability and performance. With a focus on research and development, Miller Industries continuously enhances its product offerings, integrating advanced technology to improve efficiency and safety in recovery operations. The company not only serves the North American market but also has a strong international presence, exporting its products to over 60 countries. Through its dedication to customer service and community engagement, Miller Industries has built long-lasting relationships with towing professionals and continues to lead the industry in innovation and excellence.
